events.name: Hour of Code 2015
events.description:
The Hour of Code is a global movement reaching tens of millions of students in 180+ countries. Anyone, anywhere can organize an Hour of Code event. One-hour tutorials are available in over 40 languages. No experience needed. Ages 4 to 104.

Drop in to Science Centre for Hour of Code from 7th to 12th December and you can also play with watercolor bots, explore the SUTD mobile fablab, take apart electronics and interact with Makers and professional coders. Write your first programme and undestand more about computational thinking!  Stay tuned for details!!

Programme timings: 10am to 12.30pm and 2pm to 5pm
Cost: The workshop and activities are free of charge. Admission to Science Centre applies to non-members

events.name: Micro Hack Mondays
events.description: A space to meet like-minded people in the media & from the developer beat every first Monday of the month over food & drinks. Perfect for anyone who has a story or an idea that could be told interactively but doesn't know where or how to get started. Or, for anyone who has a new code or library to try out but doesn't have a story angle yet. More information to come - we'll send out announcements soon.
events.location: ST Innovation Lab - SPH, 1000 Toa Payoh North, Singapore
